description.value: Moderate Boon: When you use it to protect others, your shield blooms with roses brimming with razor-sharp thorns. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Shield Warden (Fighter)] feat, even if you don't meet its prerequisites. If you already had that feat, if your shield takes damage from a melee Strike in defense of your ally, the attacker takes piercing damage equal to half the shield's Hardness.
